description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Payroll_Payee_Province_AnnualObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Payroll_Payee_Province_AnnualObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Payroll_Payee_Province_AnnualObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Provide an existing Payroll Payee Province Annual reference to update that Provincial Annual election.

Province_Annual_Election_Data.description: The worker on the Provincial Annual election.
The effective date of the Provincial Annual Election, should be the next payment date for the worker to allow the system to correctly annualize the election for the remainder of the year.

Province_Annual_Election_Data.description: The Province the tax election was issued for.
The authorized amount for costs not deducted from salary, such as childcare, alimony, or maintenance payments.
The authorized amount for costs such as medical expenses and charitable donations.
Total amount the worker paid to purchase approved shares of capital stock in a labour sponsored venture capital corporation. (Not Quebec)

validation.validation: For tax elections as of 2022-01-01, enter zero in the Labour-Sponsored Funds field or leave it blank.
The labour-sponsored funds tax credit cannot be entered when the province is Quebec.
The annual deduction amount can only be specified when the province is Quebec.
Worker has no Position within this company. Tax Elections can only be created for Companies for which the Worker has a Position.
